disputes.title: Online Dispute Resolution
disputes.subtitle: Resolve your disputes through our EU-compliant platform
disputes.what_is_odr_desc: Online Dispute Resolution (ODR) is a method for resolving consumer disputes without going to court. It's a free service for EU consumers.
disputes.contact_form_desc: Please fill out the form below to submit your dispute. Include as much detail as possible to help us resolve your issue faster.

disputes.submit_error: Failed to submit dispute. Please try again or contact support.
disputes.eu_odr_desc: Access the official EU platform for alternative dispute resolution
disputes.faq_1_a: Most disputes are resolved within 30-60 days of submission.
disputes.faq_2_a: Yes, ODR is completely free for consumers. There are no hidden fees.
disputes.faq_3_q: What if ODR doesn't resolve my dispute?
disputes.faq_3_a: If ODR is unsuccessful, you retain the right to pursue legal action.
disputes.faq_4_q: Can I appeal an ODR decision?
disputes.faq_4_a: Appeal options depend on the specific case and will be explained in the decision letter.
disputes.direct_contact_desc: Prefer to contact us directly? Reach out to our support team.
disputes.direct_contact_text: If you prefer to contact us directly instead of using this form, please email us at support@example.com
